official_title: Validation of FACBC as an Early Indicator of Sub-clinical Metastatic Disease Among High-risk Prostate Cancer Patients With Presumed Localized Disease
inclusion_criteria:
* High-risk prostate cancer patients eligible for standard of care surgery

  * At least clinical T3a disease, and/or Gleasonâ‰¥8, and/or Prostate-Specific Antigen (PSA) >20, as per clinical assessment and routine guidelines
* Undergone standard of care conventional imaging (CT and/or MRI; bone scan and/or sodium fluoride (NaF) PET)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Definitive findings of systemic metastasis on conventional imaging.
